The FastFormat (C++) Application Layer
[FastFormat]


Modules

 Bundles
 Components for loading/defining format specifications.
 Contingent
 Components for contingent action.
 Inserters
 Inserter components, to allow explicit insertion of arbitrary types into FastFormat write()/fmt() statements.
 Rigging
 Utility components that are used to glue the various parts of the application layer together.
 Sinks
 Sink components, to allow output, via FastFormat write()/fmt() statements, to arbitrary types.
 Interface Functions
